original_text: The men shouted to Lot, ‘Where are the men who are staying with you tonight? Bring them out here to us. We want to have sex with them.’
korean_text: 롯을 부르고 그에게 이르되 오늘 밤에 네게 온 사람들이 어디 있느냐 이끌어 내라 우리가 그들을 상관하리라

sentences.original_text: who are staying with you tonight?
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 밤 당신과 함께 머무는 남자들이

sentences.original_text: Bring them out here to us.
We want to have sex with them.
